name: Defiled Survivors
description:
Defiled Survivors is a medieval themed, action roguelite game that challenges you to defeat thousands of enemies and bosses in order to progress through enemy waves. As a player, you can choose from different characters, each with their own attributes and play styles. To enhance your character's abilities, you can select passive skills as you level up, purchase skill, items, and companions in game.

The game requires you to move around the map, leveling up and choose right build to improve your chances of survival. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, and you'll face tougher enemies and bosses.



Content in prologue:
  • Only one character
  • Only one difficulty
  • 177 skills

Controls:
Supports mouse, keyboard, controller.
